message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both move on.
Alice, let's be practical. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Consider the depreciation - a good deal now is better than risking a worse outcome later.
Bob, time is money, and yours is depreciating quickly. This is my final offer before I aim for an even bigger slice of the pie.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this 55/45 split, or I will be forced to go even lower in the next round.  Don't push your luck further.
Bob, this is your last chance to get a reasonable share. The clock is ticking, and your money is evaporating. Take it or leave it.
